overview: Brent Tartar is the VP of Sales and is responsible for spearheading the sales initiatives of Jagged Peakâ€™s turnkey e-commerce solution for manufacturers who wish to establish a direct to customer sales channel. Tartarâ€™s previous position as Senior Vice President of Sales and Marketing was held at W.A. Wilde Company, New Englandâ€™s largest direct marketing and fulfillment solutions provider. Mr. Tartar brings more than 20 years of fulfillment and direct marketing experience to Jagged Peak, extending across a wide range of vertical markets, in both B2B and B2C environments. Prior to his position at W.A. Wilde, Tartar was the Vice President of Sales for Aero Fulfillment. He has had significant success in selling and managing relationships with distinguished national companies in the consumer package goods, pharmaceutical, insurance and financial services industries. Mr. Tartar is a graduate of Northern Kentucky University.
